title: Why has Gragas's Body Slam hit box not been fixed yet?
body: He doesn't even need to touch you for it to land. It still hits you if you're anywhere near him at the end of the path, without actually colliding with anything.

replies.body: Because it's his gravitational pull. If you get too close you will get pulled into him.
Gragas is so fat Runeterra orbits around him

Gragas is so fat that his teammates couldn't leave fountain until he moved out  of the way.

Gragas is so fat he had to wear Giant's Belt around his arm.

Gragas is so fat that Vladimir had a heart attack shortly after Q'ing him.

Gragas is so fat that when Cho'gath tried to eat him he choked to death.

Gragas is so fat that when Fizz ulted him he ate the shark.

Gragas is so fat he is immune to knock-ups.

Gragas is so fat when Sion ults him, Sion gets stunned.
Nah - Gragas is so fat, when Sion ults him, he bounces off Gragas' stomach and keeps running the other direction.
So {{champion:79}} is as fat as Ornn then? If so, we can have a 5v5 One For All game of pinball using Ornn's Ultimate.
Why am I imagining two Ornn's facing each other with ulting Sion bouncing back and forth between them screaming "COWWAAAARRDDDSSS!"
{{champion:14}} COWAAA-ow-AAA-ow-AAAA-ow-AAAR-ow-RRDS!
Gragas so fat daisy wont come out when candy king ivern calls her around him out of fear
Gragas is so fat that when he goes near Aurelion, Aurelion's stars start revolving around him
Gragas is so fat if the baron spawns under him, the baron is knocked away.
He's proof the earth isn't flat

Annie ult can't melt turrets.
9/11 was teammate's int confirmed.
haha what a nice joke
Gragas is Runeterra's core. The land is folded around him.

"Why has Gragas's Body Slam hit box not been fixed yet?"

Because there is nothing wrong with it?
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rE1u9gPioJQ

> [{quoted}](name=I am Oto,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uNkAJwvp,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2017-08-17T14:48:34.005+0000)
>
> https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rE1u9gPioJQ

thats bull shit and i would be tilted as fuck.
That's not a problem with Gragas' E hitbox; it's an issue with flash.
I once hit a Syndra with Akali's e after she flashed over a wall.
That's intended I'm pretty sure
The damage on Akali's E starts at the beginning of the cast, so this is intended. It is not like Alistar's Pulverize which happens at the end of the cast.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JzLCTJZM0Lg

Maybe you'll find an excuse for that one too. Wait a minute...

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JZinm7ZvO5I

Oh yeah, we can do this all day.

(PS, Mute sound)
Song name?
"How to rape your ears"
The one and only true, Darude.
God fucking damnit man, who the hell puts the sound warning at the bottom of the video!?? I was wearing headphones at 90% volume man,my ears where molested.

To be fair, the first one is probably a result of a larger issue with hitboxes interacting with river ramps that occurs with a lot of spells.  The second one... yeah.  Gragas would have hit Zed, but it's really wonky it decided to trigger the hit from that position rather than where he would have actually impacted.
Uh, there was a minion in front of him. Or did you miss that? There was no chance he would've hit, because he was blocked by a minion.

I didnt see your mute warning in time and i watched the first one without muting

I am currently sitting up in my bed when i should be trying to sleep because of that noise

https://youtu.be/iPJe3QdY_Mw?t=12s

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_8Lo_qTpOJA

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=owlEKEfoUBw

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AwFP_fVEoe0

You're vastly misinformed sir
Just pink ward his fat belly
that actually work?
No its a meme
{{champion:113}} wants this hitbox

> [{quoted}](name=Funkin Dunkin,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uNkAJwvp,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2017-08-17T15:21:42.759+0000)
>
> {{champion:113}} wants this hitbox

I was going to say that, Sejuani's Q barely even stuns and has a tiny hitbox.

Gragas is lucky.
Don't forget Shen, his taunt still misses 90% of the time, nevermind Gragas' e completely nullifying it if both collide.

Shen's hitbox is a square. Pinpoint percision and skill is required.
Sejuani's hitbox is a rectangle. It's forgiving but you have to aim it still and you can easily be sidestepped.
Gragas's hitbox is a weird eldritch shape that extends into several different planes of existance to hit you.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=bNunFdgT60A

Amazing isn't it?

I still think its a BS hitbox, but i'm pretty sure riots reasoning is his stomach sticks out. The dash indicator isn't wrong in that he moves from the start to finish, it just doesn't properly display the range of being able to actually hit anyone.
the hit itself has a hitbox, then there is dash distance, this is also noticeable on vi if you play her a fair bit, give it a try yourself and learn

Yeaaaaah but I've got to give it to the OP. Gragas and Vi's hitboxes do NOT feel the same. Vi usually at least touches your model- I've seen Gragas not and still cc you. Granted, I've only rarely faced him but once I was against a Grag support and I definitely noticed I was NOT being hit by him but still getting cc'd after the 3rd Flash Flying Fat-Man Hump.

Yeah but the amount of difference in the graphic representation and the actual hitbox on Vi and Gragas are very different. I notice its only a small amount larger than the graphic on Vi, while whenever i play gragas I hit people that are not only not touching me, but are a clear hundred units away. It isn't really a fair comparison, he needs the hitbox shrunk to match the graphic better.

Poppy's Steadfast Presence doesn't even block Body Slam properly.

Unlike every other dash where as soon as the dash starts,  SFP will cancel it, Gragas gets to do his entire animation; move, deal damage to you and stun you before SFP will pop him up for a brief second.

It is pretty irritating even when playing him too.

You'll go for a bodyslam, or god forbid a bodyslam-flash, but you will clip a minion that is nowhere near you.

Personally I think they should slim down the hitbox while he is in flight, but sort of make it that once it hits it has an impact radius larger than the initial hitbox (retaining the current width).
And to think that's after a significant nerf last season. Why hasn't Thresh or Blitz pull been fixed?
Because he's that fat. The shockwave generatedfrom the massive force of his bodies inertia knocks you up.
Why hasn't the hit boxes for anything been fixed?
Because it wasn't a problem before he became meta.

> [{quoted}](name=Dengeden,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uNkAJwvp,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2017-08-17T19:05:29.934+0000)
>
> Because it wasn't a problem before he became meta.

It's always been a problem, but with the shift to faster paced games in the recent season, being hit by his body slam means you're going to lose 70% of your health or potentially die. It's a much bigger deal.
